everything!<br>Check the AgEcon Search website occasionally. We hope in the near future<br>to be able to tailor alerts more specifically to your interests.<br><br>TITLES of recent additions to AgEcon Search (full records with URLs follow)    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-12T14:55:51-05:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Linda Eells</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;1fab0175.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;c2819fc8.1503">   <title>Recent additions to AgEcon Search </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;c2819fc8.1503</link>   <description> March 5, 2015<br><br>Welcome, new email list members who joined us at the AARES Conference in<br>New Zealand! Conference presentations will be announced here when we have<br>them posted.<br><br>TITLES of recent additions to AgEcon Search (full records with URLs follow)    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-05T16:00:15-06:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Linda Eells</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;c2819fc8.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;3d4fa5ea.1502">   <title>Recent additions to AgEcon Search </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;3d4fa5ea.1502</link>   <description> February 12, 2015<br><br>AgEcon Search celebrates its 20th Anniversary in 2015, with over 82,000<br>papers. Help us celebrate by contacting us with ideas for new working<br>paper series, conference proceedings, or small journals that are missing<br>from AgEcon Search.<br><br>TITLES of other recent additions (full records with URLs follow)    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-12T14:10:07-06:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Linda Eells</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;3d4fa5ea.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;c6c5c9e7.1502">   <title><No subject> </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;c6c5c9e7.1502</link>   <description> February 6, 2015<br><br>AgEcon Search will be at the Australian Agricultural and Resource Economics<br>Society (AARES) Conference,<br>Feb. 10 - 13, Rotorua, New Zealand<br>Stop by the booth in the Exhibit Area and say hello!<br><br>TITLES of other recent additions (full records with URLs follow)    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-06T17:32:11-06:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Linda Eells</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;c6c5c9e7.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;769e3516.1501">   <title>Looking for Lecture to teach Sustainable Agriculture </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;769e3516.1501</link>   <description> Greetings from Institut de Formations et de Managements (IFM).<br><br>IFM is, an equitable and competitive employer is currently recruiting<br>Professors/ Researchers, with several years of experience that are ready to<br>empower and to teach students in MSc programs.<br><br>We are looking for Professor/Lecturer/Trainer on:<br><br>1. Agro-Ecosystem Analysis and Management (blended learning or face<br>to face)<br><br>2. Landscape. Ecology and Biodiversity (blended learning or face to<br>face) [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-29T17:40:28+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>IFM</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;769e3516.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;b760258.1501">   <title>Looking for Lecture to teach Sustainable Agriculture in Spanish </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;b760258.1501</link>   <description> Greetings from Institut de Formations et de Managements (IFM).<br><br>IFM is, an equitable and competitive employer is currently recruiting Professors/ Researchers, with several years of experience that are ready to empower and to teach students in MSc programs.<br><br>We are looking for Professor on:<br><br>1. Agro-Ecosystem Analysis and Management (blended learning or face to face)<br>2. Landscape. Ecology and Biodiversity (blended learning or face to face)<br>3. Agricultural Policy and Agro-Environmental Regulations (blended learning or face to face)<br>4. AgroEcology and Environment (blended learning or face to face)<br>5. Plant Production Systems (blended learning or face to face)<br>6. Nutrient [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-24T23:08:40+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Mr Robert ROJAS</dc:creator> <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;cb64a50e.1501</link>   <description> *With apologies for cross-posting* Dear all, The Journal of Agribusiness in Developing and Emerging Economies<http://emeraldgrouppublishing.com/products/journals/journals.htm?id=jadee> is pleased to release the titles of its forthcoming articles. Publication of the below papers is guaranteed subject to rights and permissions. \ufffd\ufffd Chilli production and adoption of chilli-based agribusiness in Indonesia By Joko Mariyono, Sumarno Sumarno Keywords: intensive chilli farming, commercialisation of chilli, technology adoption, logit model, Java, Indonesia \ufffd\ufffd Does Contract Farming Improve Smallholder Income? The Case of Avocado Farmers in Kenya By Mercy Maiwa Mwanbi, Judith Oduol, Patience Mshenga, Mwanarusi Saidi Keywords: Contract Farming, Smallholder, Household Income, Avocado, Impact, Sub Saharan rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;ed3b806.1411">   <title>SAGE Business Cases - Call for Authors PAID </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;ed3b806.1411</link>   <description> SAGE Business Cases is an informative new online offering from SAGE. The<br>collection, consisting of business and management case studies, associated<br>teaching notes and videos will be hosted on SAGE\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds premier eBook platform,<br>SAGE Knowledge, and will be made available to academic libraries on a<br>global basis, allowing for institution-wide online access to every case<br>study. Golson Media, producer of this project, offers an honorarium of<br>$150. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-24T12:36:09-05:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kara Ward</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;ed3b806.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;3501d290.1411">   <title>Recent additions to AgEcon Search </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;3501d290.1411</link>   <description> November 7, 2014<br><br>We send only a small representative sample of newer AgEcon Search content<br>in these alerts due to the high volume of papers posted. Visit our website<br>for the full listings:<br><br>http://ageconsearch.umn.edu<br><br>TITLES of other recent additions (full records with URLs follow)    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-07T17:05:02-06:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Linda Eells</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;3501d290.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;a7a7b227.1410">   <title>Recent Additions to AgEcon Search </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;a7a7b227.1410</link>   <description> October 31, 2014<br><br>http://ageconsearch.umn.edu<br><br>TITLES of other recent additions (full records with URLs follow)    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-31T13:49:53-05:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Linda Eells</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;a7a7b227.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;d46f8d45.1410">   <title>Recent additions to AgEcon Search </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;d46f8d45.1410</link>   <description> October 8, 2014<br><br>http://ageconsearch.umn.edu<br><br>TITLES of other recent additions (full records with URLs follow)    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-08T16:04:27-05:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Linda Eells</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;d46f8d45.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;ed64533e.1409">   <title>Sage Encyclopedia of Nutrition and Health Call for Authors </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;ed64533e.1409</link>   <description> We are inviting academic editorial contributors to The SAGE Encyclopedia of<br>Nutrition &amp; Health, a new 4-volume reference to be published in 2016. This<br>reference provides a broad multidisciplinary perspective on nutrition and<br>behavioral health, answering questions such as: What are the cognitive<br>effects of malnourishment of children? Which studies show which foods lower<br>cholesterol? How is behavior modification used in obesity counseling? What<br>are the FDA rules governing vitamins and supplements marketed on multiple<br>media platforms? What is a \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdfood desert\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd? How do nutrient needs change<br>across the life span? What are the economic and psychosocial impacts on<br>communities [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-21T01:37:28-04:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Melodie Hagspiel</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;ed64533e.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item at<br>http://ageconsearch.umn.edu/handle/176900<br><br>http://ageconsearch.umn.edu<br><br>TITLES of other recent additions (full records with URLs follow)   </description>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;6e69148b.1408">   <title>Recent additions to AgEcon Search </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;6e69148b.1408</link>   <description> August 15, 2014<br><br>Julie Kelly and Linda Eells, AgEcon Search coordinators, will be staffing<br>the AgEcon Search exhibit at the EAAE 2014 Congress in Ljubljana, Slovenia<br>August 26-29. Please visit us!<br><br>http://ageconsearch.umn.edu<br><br>TITLES of other recent additions (full records with URLs follow)    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-15T11:29:05-05:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Linda Eells</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;6e69148b.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;4462a2e4.1407">   <title>Forthcoming articles in the Journal of Agribusiness in Developing and Emerging Economies </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AGRIC-ECON;4462a2e4.1407</link>   <description> *With apologies for cross-posting* Dear all, The Journal of Agribusiness in Developing and Emerging Economies is pleased to release the titles of its forthcoming articles. Publication of the below papers is guaranteed subject to rights and permissions. * Chilli production and adoption of chilli-based agribusiness in Indonesia by Joko Mariyono, Sumarno Sumarno Keywords: intensive chilli farming, commercialisation of chilli, technology adoption, logit model, Java, Indonesia * Does Contract Farming Improve Smallholder Income?
